narrative:
There were no non-compliant items identified during this inspection.  Applicant wishes to be licensed as a Class A
dealer.
Applicant will sent the license fee and a copy of the report to the Western Regional Office within 20 days to:
USDA APHIS Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave
Bldg B MS3W11
Ft. Collins, CO  80526
No regulated activities may be conducted until the USDA license has been issued.
The inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
